About.title: About Us
About.subtitle: We are committed to building the purest and most useful online tool collection on the internet.
About.philosophyIntro: In today's internet, it's becoming increasingly difficult to find a simple, easy-to-use tool website that isn't filled with ads. Most sites require registration, upload files to servers, or are cluttered with intrusive pop-up ads.
About.philosophyIntro2: Online Utilities exists to solve this problem. We adhere to the following principles:

principles.privacy: Privacy First: All our core tools (like JSON formatter, image converter, password generator) run locally in your browser. Your data (passwords, images, code) is never uploaded to our servers.
principles.openSource: Free & Open Source: Our core features are open source on GitHub, so you can review the code for security.
principles.efficient: Simple & Efficient: No tedious registration process, open and use, done and go.

About.contactIntro: If you find any bugs while using our tools, or have suggestions for new tools, feel free to contact us:
